Trade/Device Name(s): Zeus Scientific VZV IgM ELISA Test System
Zeus Scientific Varicella-Zoster (VZV) IgM ELISA Test Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Zeus Scientific VZV IgM ELISA Test System for qualitative detection of IgM antibody to Varicella-Zoster virus in human serum
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the qualitative detection of IgM class antibodies to Varicella Zoster Virus in human serum as an aid in the diagnosis of primary infection or reactivation
